<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Helper function to build a wide generic register \\p DstReg of type \\p</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// RegTy from smaller parts. This will produce a G&#95;MERGE&#95;VALUES,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// G&#95;BUILD&#95;VECTOR, G&#95;CONCAT&#95;VECTORS, or sequence of G&#95;INSERT as appropriate</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// for the types.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p PartRegs must be registers of type \\p PartTy.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If \\p ResultTy does not evenly break into \\p PartTy sized pieces, the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// remainder must be specified with \\p LeftoverRegs of type \\p LeftoverTy.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Handles most opcodes. Split \\p MI into same instruction on sub-vectors or</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// scalars with \\p NumElts elements (1 for scalar). Supports uneven splits:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// there can be leftover sub-vector with fewer then \\p NumElts or a leftover</Highlight></CodeLine>
